Reviews.Title: “Alright if you want the basics!”
Reviews.Author: TravelbugfromNZ
Reviews.Content: stayed friends week typical motel set pretty standard nice patio sat drink evenings restaruant bar lady reception english accent nice helpful 10 15 min walk train tiring days feet day stairs front prepared carry suitcases sydney sights day didnt flash hotel lack cleaning staying hairs bathroom floor rubbish guests bin dont cleaned week didnt vacuum clean bathroom clean own dishes grotty cloth day returned balcony door left wide housekeeper alright stay basics paid bit stay cleaned
